product_name: The North Face Ultra Fastpack GTX Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: Delivering lightweight performance and waterproof protection, the Ultra FastPack GORE-TEX(R) Hiking Shoes from The North Face are built for moving light and fast over your favorite trails. Water-resistant mesh uppers with synthetic overlays provide lightweight structure and support. GORE-TEX waterproof, breathable membranes keep feet dry in wet conditions. EVA midsoles provide comfortable cushioning for long days on the trail. Pebax(R) polymer shanks provide torsional stability, impact protection and energy return; Pebax is lighter than polyurethane and is built to withstand extreme temperatures. Built-in CRADLE(TM) stability technology guides your foot through biomechanically efficient positions from heel strike to toe-off, enabling smooth, efficient strides. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles on the Ultra FastPack GORE-TEX Hiking Shoes provide great grip on wet or uneven surfaces.
short_description: Delivering lightweight performance and waterproof protection, the Ultra FastPack GORE-TEX(R) Hiking Shoes from The North Face are built for moving light and fast over your favorite trails.
